com.echsylon.atlantis

Class Configuration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.echsylon.atlantis.Configuration.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Configuration

    public static final class Configuration.Builder
extends Object
    This class offers means of building a configuration object directly from code (as opposed to configure one in a JSON asset or file).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder()
      Creates a new builder based on an uninitialized configuration object.
      Builder(Configuration source)
      Creates a new builder based on the provided configuration object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseHeader(String key, String value)
      Adds a default response header to the configuration being built.
      Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseHeaders(Map<String,List<String>> responseHeaders)
      Adds all default response headers to the configuration being built, where neither the key nor the value is empty or null.
      Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseHeaders(String key, List<String> values)
      Adds all non-empty default response headers to the configuration being built.
      Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseHeaders(String key, String... values)
      Adds all non-empty default response headers to the configuration being built.
      Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseSetting(String key, String value)
      Deprecated. 
      Use setSetting(String, String) instead. Planned to be removed in Atlantis 3.0
      Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseSettings(Map<String,String> settings)
      Deprecated. 
      Use setSettings(Map) instead. Planned to be removed in Atlantis 3.0
      Configuration.Builder addRequest(MockRequest mockRequest)
      Adds a mockRequest to the configuration being built.
      Configuration build()
      Returns a sealed configuration object which can not be further built on.
      Configuration.Builder setDefaultResponseHeader(String key, String value)
      Adds a default response header to the configuration being build, replacing any and all existing values for the same key.
      Configuration.Builder setFallbackBaseUrl(String realBaseUrl)
      Deprecated. 
      Use setSetting(String, String) with SettingsManager.FALLBACK_BASE_URL as key instead. Planned to be removed in Atlantis 3.0
      Configuration.Builder setRequestFilter(MockRequest.Filter filter)
      Sets the request filter logic to use when matching a request to serve.
      Configuration.Builder setSetting(String key, String value)
      Adds a default response setting to the configuration being built.
      Configuration.Builder setSettings(Map<String,String> settings)
      Adds all default response settings to the configuration being built where neither the key nor the value is empty or null.
      Configuration.Builder setTokenHelper(Atlantis.TokenHelper tokenHelper)
      Sets a helper implementation that manages token parsing and state keeping based on request data.
      Configuration.Builder setTransformationHelper(Atlantis.TransformationHelper helper)
      Sets the real/mock context transformation helper to use when relaying a request to a real server and introducing a real response to the mock context.

        Creates a new builder based on the provided configuration object.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • addRequest

        public Configuration.Builder addRequest(MockRequest mockRequest)
        Adds a mockRequest to the configuration being built. This method doesn't add null pointers.
        Parameters:
        mockRequest - The mockRequest to add.
        Returns:
        This builder object, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setDefaultResponseHeader

        public Configuration.Builder setDefaultResponseHeader(String key,
                                                      String value)
        Adds a default response header to the configuration being build, replacing any and all existing values for the same key.
        Parameters:
        key - The header key.
        value - The new header value.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • addDefaultResponseHeader

        public Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseHeader(String key,
                                                      String value)
        Adds a default response header to the configuration being built. Any existing keys will be overwritten. If a corresponding header exists in a mock response definition, then that header will be honored instead.
        Parameters:
        key - The header key.
        value - The header value.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • addDefaultResponseHeaders

        public Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseHeaders(String key,
                                                       List<String> values)
        Adds all non-empty default response headers to the configuration being built.
        Parameters:
        key - The header key.
        values - The header values.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • addDefaultResponseHeaders

        public Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseHeaders(String key,
                                                       String... values)
        Adds all non-empty default response headers to the configuration being built.
        Parameters:
        key - The header key.
        values - The header values.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • addDefaultResponseHeaders

        public Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseHeaders(Map<String,List<String>> responseHeaders)
        Adds all default response headers to the configuration being built, where neither the key nor the value is empty or null. Any existing keys will be overwritten. If a corresponding header exists in a mock response definition, then that header will be honored instead.
        Parameters:
        responseHeaders - The headers to add.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • addDefaultResponseSetting

        public Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseSetting(String key,
                                                       String value)
        Deprecated. Use setSetting(String, String) instead. Planned to be removed in Atlantis 3.0
        Adds a default response setting to the configuration being built. Any existing keys will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        key - The setting key.
        value - The setting value.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • addDefaultResponseSettings

        public Configuration.Builder addDefaultResponseSettings(Map<String,String> settings)
        Deprecated. Use setSettings(Map) instead. Planned to be removed in Atlantis 3.0
        Adds all default response settings to the configuration being built where neither the key nor the value is empty or null. Any existing keys will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings to add.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setFallbackBaseUrl

        public Configuration.Builder setFallbackBaseUrl(String realBaseUrl)
        Deprecated. Use setSetting(String, String) with SettingsManager.FALLBACK_BASE_URL as key instead. Planned to be removed in Atlantis 3.0
        Sets the fallback base url to hit when no mocked request was found and Atlantis is configured to fall back to real world responses.
        Parameters:
        realBaseUrl - The real-world base URL, including scheme.
        Returns:
        This builder object, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setSetting

        public Configuration.Builder setSetting(String key,
                                        String value)
        Adds a default response setting to the configuration being built. Any existing keys will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        key - The setting key.
        value - The setting value.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setSettings

        public Configuration.Builder setSettings(Map<String,String> settings)
        Adds all default response settings to the configuration being built where neither the key nor the value is empty or null. Any existing keys will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings to add.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setRequestFilter

        public Configuration.Builder setRequestFilter(MockRequest.Filter filter)
        Sets the request filter logic to use when matching a request to serve.
        Parameters:
        filter - The request filter implementation. May be null.
        Returns:
        This builder object, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setTokenHelper

        public Configuration.Builder setTokenHelper(Atlantis.TokenHelper tokenHelper)
        Sets a helper implementation that manages token parsing and state keeping based on request data.
        Parameters:
        tokenHelper - The new token helper implementation.
        Returns:
        This builder instance, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • setTransformationHelper

        public Configuration.Builder setTransformationHelper(Atlantis.TransformationHelper helper)
        Sets the real/mock context transformation helper to use when relaying a request to a real server and introducing a real response to the mock context.
        Parameters:
        helper - The mock transformation helper. May be null.
        Returns:
        This builder object, allowing chaining of method calls.

      • build

        public Configuration build()
        Returns a sealed configuration object which can not be further built on.
        Returns:
        The final configuration object.
